para.emphasis: dotnet toolkit renamed to win toolkit

listitem.para: The dotnet toolkit has been renamed to the win toolkit in e.g. the Project wizard and properties.
The meters application has been removed from the samples project and from the examples directory.

para.emphasis: Change to the order of writing test results

listitem.para: In previous versions, once a test run was finished, the test results were first written to a file (XML and HTML), then to the database.
As of this version, this order has been changed. The test results are first written to the database.

The drivers used for the embedded H2 database have been updated from version 1.1.117 to 1.3.168. These two versions are not compatible, because the file format has been changed. More information about changes in H2 are available at http://www.h2database.com/html/changelog.html.
Old embedded H2 databases are not readable with the new version of the ITE. You should therefore follow the migration steps mentioned in the installation manual.
All database drivers used by ITE to generate reports with Birt have been updated:
MySQL data base driver version updated from 5.1.10 to 5.1.25, see http://dev.mysql.com/doc/relnotes/connector-j/en/news-5-1.html.
Oracle data base driver version updated from 10.2.0.2.0 to 11.2.0.3.0, see http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/database/enterprise-edition/jdbc-faq-090281.html
PostgreSQL data base driver version updated from 8.4-701 to 9.2-1002, see http://jdbc.postgresql.org/download.html

para.emphasis: Libraries for HTML tests version updated

listitem.para: The version of Selenium used by ITE to interact with HTML AUTs has been updated from version 2.30.0 to 2.33.0. More information about changes in Selenium are available at http://selenium.googlecode.com/git/java/CHANGELOG
Version 2.33.0 of Selenium supports Firefox 10esr, 17esr, 19 and 20 and IE10.

The version of jQuery used by ITE for object mapping and test execution has been updated from version 1.7.2 to 1.10.1. More information about supported browers are available at http://jquery.com/download/.

JaCoCo has been updated from version 0.5.9 to 0.6.3, which fully supports code coverage for Java 7. More information about changes in JaCoCo are available at http://www.eclemma.org/jacoco/trunk/doc/changes.html.

Version 1.7.2 of SLF4J in combination with version 1.0.7 of LOGBack are now used for logging. More information about changes in SLF4J and LOGBack are available at http://www.slf4j.org/news.html and http://logback.qos.ch/news.html.
